uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data

Class XMLDataUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.XMLDataUtils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Contexed

    public class XMLDataUtils
extends java.lang.Object
implements Contexed
    This class provides common boilerplate code for the loading and creation of XML data dumps. It is primarily intended for use in tests.
    Author:
    spb

      • readFixtures

        public void readFixtures(java.lang.Class clazz,
                java.lang.String... fixtures)
                  throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                         org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                         java.io.IOException,
                         DataFault
        Read a set of fixture files. All fixture files read by a single instance of XMLDataUtils will use the same UnDumper so back references may be made to previously loaded files.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        DataFault
        Parameters:
        clazz - A Class to find resources relative to.
